thread.title: Kershaw, Dodgers top Mets 3-1, force NLDS to decisive Game 5
thread.title_full: Kershaw, Dodgers top Mets 3-1, force NLDS to decisive Game 5

title: Kershaw, Dodgers top Mets 3-1, force NLDS to decisive Game 5
text:
> Top News Kershaw, Dodgers top Mets 3-1, force NLDS to decisive Game 5 Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw (22) adjusts his cap between pitches against the New York Mets during the first inning of baseball's Game 4 of the National League Division Series, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in New York. (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
